scripts.test:run-fresh-db: docker-compose -f docker-compose-potgres-test.yml down -v; docker-compose --env-file .env.test -f docker-compose-potgres-test.yml up -d
scripts.test: npm run test:run-fresh-db; dotenvx run --env-file=.env.test -- jest --runInBand
scripts.clear:generate:migration:run:locally: sqd codegen ; docker compose -f docker-compose-potgres.yml down -v;docker compose -f docker-compose-potgres.yml up -d;sqd migration:generate; sqd run
scripts.clear:run:locally: sqd build ; docker compose -f docker-compose-potgres.yml down -v;docker compose -f docker-compose-potgres.yml up -d; sqd run
scripts.run:locally: docker compose -f docker-compose-potgres.yml up -d; sqd build; sqd run
